context: I broke your trust by keeping secrets
letters:
My Dearest,

I hope this note finds you in a moment of calm, as it is with a heavy heart that I write to you. I want to begin by saying how truly sorry I am for breaking your trust. Keeping secrets from you was a mistake that I deeply regret, and it pains me to know that I have caused you hurt and disappointment.

You deserve honesty and transparency in our relationship, and I failed to provide that. Even the smallest secrets can create distance, and I recognize that my actions have led to a barrier between us that should never have existed. I let fear and uncertainty guide my choices instead of coming to you openly and vulnerably, and for that, I am sincerely sorry.

Please know that I am committed to rebuilding the trust I have broken. I understand that it will take time, patience, and effort, and I am ready to face that challenge head-on. I promise to be more open with you moving forward, sharing not only my thoughts but also my feelings, and inviting you into everything that I experience.

You are my partner, my confidante, and my love. I cherish the bond we share, and the last thing I want is for past mistakes to overshadow our future. It is my deepest hope that we can work through this together, and emerge stronger than before.

Thank you for your understanding and for the love you've shown me even amidst my shortcomings. I am truly grateful to have you in my life, and I will strive every day to be the partner you deserve.

With all my love and sincerest apologies,

[Your Name]
